data.lyric:
[ti:There's No Place Like Home for Holidays]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Christmas 2014, Vol. 2]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]There's No Place Like Home for Holidays - Perry Como (佩里·科莫)
[00:00.25]Lyrics by：Allen/Stillman
[00:00.51]Composed by：Stillman/Allen
[00:00.77]Oh there's no place like home for the holidays
[00:09.17]'Cause no matter how far away you roam
[00:17.77]When you pine for the sunshine of a friendly gaze
[00:26.26]For the holidays you can't beat home sweet home
[00:36.80]I met a man who lives in Tennessee
[00:41.65]He was headin' for
[00:44.18]Pennsylvania and some home made pumpkin pie
[00:50.26]From Pennsylvania folks are travelin'
[00:54.15]Down to Dixie's sunny shore
[00:57.48]From Atlantic to Pacific
[01:00.66]Gee the traffic is terrific
[01:03.82]Oh there's no place like home for the holidays
[01:10.84]'Cause no matter how far away you roam
[01:17.30]If you want to be happy in a million ways
[01:24.00]For the holidays
[01:25.74]You can't beat home sweet home
[01:30.87]Take a bus take a train
[01:32.53]Go and hop an aeroplane
[01:34.19]Put the wife and kiddies in the family car
[01:37.51]For the pleasure that you bring
[01:39.28]When you make that doorbell ring
[01:41.43]No trip could be too far
[01:43.55]I met a man who lives in Tennessee
[01:48.63]He was headin' for
[01:51.01]Pennsylvania and some home made pumpkin pie
[01:56.89]From Pennsylvania folks are travelin'
[02:00.92]Down to Dixie's sunny shore
[02:03.87]From Atlantic to Pacific
[02:07.55]Gee the traffic is terrific
[02:10.68]Oh there's no place like home for the holidays
[02:17.46]'Cause no matter how far away you roam
[02:23.86]If you want to be happy in a million ways
[02:30.59]For the holidays
[02:32.81]You can't beat home sweet home
[02:37.36]For the holidays
[02:39.42]You can't beat home sweet home
data.trans:
[ti:There's No Place Like Home for Holidays]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Christmas 2014, Vol. 2]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.51]//
[00:00.77]圣诞节日里 世上没有比家更好的地方了
[00:09.17]因为无论你走了多远
[00:17.77]当你渴望和煦的阳光照耀着你时
[00:26.26]圣诞节日里 你无法拒绝甜蜜温馨的家
[00:36.80]我遇见一位住在田纳西州的男人
[00:41.65]他直奔
[00:44.18]宾夕法尼亚州 家里自制的南瓜派让他马不停蹄
[00:50.26]从宾夕法尼亚州出发 人们长途跋涉
[00:54.15]来到南方的阳光海岸
[00:57.48]从大西洋到太平洋
[01:00.66]交通糟糕透顶
[01:03.82]圣诞节日里 世上没有比家更好的地方了
[01:10.84]因为无论你走了多远
[01:17.30]如果你想要沉浸在快乐里
[01:24.00]圣诞节日里
[01:25.74]你无法拒绝甜蜜温馨的家
[01:30.87]坐上公共汽车 搭上火车
[01:32.53]纵身跳上飞机
[01:34.19]让妻子和孩子坐进家庭轿车里
[01:37.51]为了你带来的欢乐
[01:39.28]当你按响门铃时
[01:41.43]再远的旅途也无所谓
[01:43.55]我遇见一位住在田纳西州的男人
[01:48.63]他直奔
[01:51.01]宾夕法尼亚州 家里自制的南瓜派让他马不停蹄
[01:56.89]从宾夕法尼亚州出发 人们长途跋涉
[02:00.92]来到南方的阳光海岸
[02:03.87]从大西洋到太平洋
[02:07.55]交通糟糕透顶
[02:10.68]圣诞节日里 世上没有比家更好的地方了
[02:17.46]因为无论你走了多远
[02:23.86]如果你想要沉浸在快乐里
[02:30.59]圣诞节日里
[02:32.81]你无法拒绝甜蜜温馨的家
[02:37.36]圣诞节日里
[02:39.42]你无法拒绝甜蜜温馨的家
